entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
